thread.title: Iraq Is a Huge Opportunity for Trump - WSJ
thread.title_full: Iraq Is a Huge Opportunity for Trump - WSJ

author: Bartle Bull
title: Iraq Is a Huge Opportunity for Trump - WSJ
text:
Iraq Is a Huge Opportunity for Trump Abandoned in 2011, the country had made a remarkable comeback. The U.S. can help it succeed. By Bartle Bull Updated Feb. 21, 2017 7:37 p.m. ET 
Defense Secretary Jim Mattis’s visit to Iraq on Monday made headlines largely because he reassured the Iraqi people that the U.S. is “not in Iraq to seize anybody’s oil.” Meanwhile, as the battle for Mosul continues, the commander of U.S. forces in Iraq acknowledged that, while U.S. forces remain in an advise-and-assist role, “we are operating closer and deeper into the Iraqi formation.” 
Perhaps because of Iraq’s inclusion in President Trump’s ill-fated immigration order, many Iraqis tend to see him positively, as a... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
